properties.title: Cloud-scale Analytics Scenario - Data Product Batch

options.text: Cloud-scale Analytics Scenario is a prescriptive reference architecture for data with reference implementation provided by Microsoft. Visit 'aka.ms/adopt/datamanagement' for more details about the solution pattern.
Select the subscription and resource group as well as the location to specify the scope of your Data Product deployment.
Please make sure that you have a Data Management Landing Zone and Data Landing Zone deployed before deploying a Data Product or Data Integration template.

elements.name: subscriptionId
elements.label: Subscription
elements.toolTip: Select the Subscription of your Data Landing Zone.

options.text: We have already deployed a few resource groups in your Data Landing Zone, which can be used for Data Product and Data Integration Template deployments. They have the following names: '{prefix}-dp001', '{prefix}-dp002', '{prefix}-di001' and '{prefix}-di002'.

elements.name: resourceGroupId
elements.label: Resource Group
elements.toolTip: Select the Resource Group for your Data Product.

options.text: Since not all service features are available in all regions, this deployment is available in a subset of regions.

elements.name: locationName
elements.label: Location
elements.toolTip: Select the Location for your Data Product.

options.text: Specify a prefix and select an environment (Development, Test, Production) which will both be used as a prefix for all resource names. Independent of the environment, the same resources get deployed.

elements.name: environment
elements.label: Environment
elements.toolTip: Select the environment for the deployment. This is currently only used for the naming of resources.

allowedValues.label: Development
allowedValues.description: Select if you want to deploy a development environment.

allowedValues.label: Test
allowedValues.description: Select if you want to deploy a test environment.

allowedValues.label: Production
allowedValues.description: Select if you want to deploy a production environment.

elements.name: dataProductPrefix
elements.label: Data Product Prefix
elements.toolTip: Specify a prefix (min 1 and max 10 lowercase characters and numbers).

validations.message: The prefix must be between 1-10 lowercase characters and numbers.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.
Prefix currently unavailable. Please choose a different one.

subLabel.preValidation: Provide settings for your data product deployment.

options.text: Select a processing engine that you want to deploy as part of the Data Product. The service can not only be used as an additional data processing engine, but also as a workflow orchestration engine to orchestrate and trigger workflows and pipelines within Machine Learning.

elements.name: processingService
elements.label: Create Data Processing Service
elements.toolTip: Specify an additional data processing engine that you want to deploy. This can be used as Spark engine as well as for workflow orchestration.

allowedValues.label: Data Factory
allowedValues.description: Select if you want to deploy a Data Factory.

allowedValues.label: Synapse
allowedValues.description: Select if you want to deploy a Synapse workspace.

options.text: We are recommending to use a dedicated container per Data Product in the workspace Data Lake and per Data Integration in the Raw as well as Enriched & Curated Data Lake. Please select the respective Data Lake in your Data Landing Zone (e.g. Raw - '{prefix}{environment}raw', Enriched & Curated - '{prefix}{environment}encur', Workspace - '{prefix}{environment}work') and select one of the pre-existing storage account containers (e.g. 'di001', 'di002', 'dp001', 'dp002') or create and select a new one for this deployment if all of them are already in use.

elements.name: synapseDefaultStorageAccountId
elements.label: Storage Account
elements.toolTip: Select the Storage account to which you want to connect Synapse.

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('generalSettings').dataProcessingServiceDeploymentSettings.synapseDefaultStorageAccountApi.value,(item) => and(equals(item.location, steps('basics').deploymentDetails.locationName), equals(item.properties.isHnsEnabled, true))),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: synapseDefaultStorageAccountFileSystemId
elements.label: Synapse Default Storage Account Container
elements.toolTip: Default storage container for the Synapse workspace. If no option is shown, please make sure that a container exists within the storage account selected above.

elements.name: enableSqlPool
elements.label: Enable SQL Pool
elements.toolTip: Enable the deployment of an Azure SQL Pool (DW100).

constraints.validationMessage: Enable the deployment of an Azure SQL Pool (DW100).

options.text: Select the Purview account to which you want to connect the Synapse workspace.

elements.name: purviewId
elements.label: Connect to Purview Account
elements.toolTip: Select the Purview account to which you want to connect the Synapse workspace.

options.text: Specify general settings for this deployment.

elements.name: sqlFlavour
elements.label: SQL Flavour
elements.toolTip: Select the SQL flavour that should be deployed as part of this deployment.

allowedValues.label: None (No SQL Server will be deployed)

elements.name: administratorPassword
elements.toolTip: Specify an administrator password for the SQL Server and Synapse workspace, if you have selected Synapse as processing sercice.

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be alphanumeric, contain at least 8 characters, and have at least 1 letter, 1 number and one special character.

elements.name: enableCosmos
elements.label: Enable Azure Cosmos DB
elements.toolTip: Enable the deployment of Azure Cosmos DB.

constraints.validationMessage: Enable the deployment of Azure Cosmos DB.

options.text: The role assignment is optional and will assign the Synapse MSI to the respective selected default Storage Account Container (Storage Blob Data Contributor).

elements.name: enableRoleAssignments
elements.label: Enable role assignments
elements.toolTip: Enable role assignments.

constraints.validationMessage: Enable role assignments of the Synapse MSI. Please read infobox above for more details.

options.text: Specify Monitoring settings for this deployment.

elements.name: enableMonitoring
elements.label: Deploy Monitoring Components
elements.toolTip: Deploy monitoring components like Log Analytics, Azure dashboards, alerts and diagnostic settings.

elements.name: dataProductTeamEmail
elements.label: Alert Receivers Email ID
elements.toolTip: Specify Email ID to receive monitoring alerts.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

subLabel.preValidation: Provide the connectivity settings that should be used for the Data Product.

options.text: Select the Virtual Network and Subnet for your deployment.

Please select the Virtual Network of your Data Landing Zone and select a free Subnet within the Virtual Network to make sure that you have proper outbound connectivity as well as DNS name resolution in place. The subnet must have 'privateEndpointNetworkPolicies' and 'privateLinkServiceNetworkPolicies' set to disabled. This is already pre-configured for you in the DataProduct and DataIntegration subnets in the Data Landing Zone Vnet.

elements.name: virtualNetworkId
elements.label: Virtual Network
elements.toolTip: Select the Virtual Network for your Data Product.

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').virtualNetwork.virtualNetworkApi.value,(item) => equals(item.location, steps('basics').deploymentDetails.locationName)),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: subnetId
elements.label: Subnet
elements.toolTip: Select the Subnet for your Data Product. The subnet must have 'privateEndpointNetworkPolicies' and 'privateLinkServiceNetworkPolicies' set to disabled.

options.text: Select the Private DNS Zone settings for your deployment.

We are deploying all services with private endpoints and disabled public network access to reduce the data exfiltration risk. For each private endpoint, DNS A-records need to be created in a Private DNS Zones. Therefore, these either need to deployed through Azure Policies or you have to provide the Private DNS Zones that should be used for this deployment. We are assuming that all Private DNS Zones are created in the same subscription. Deploying DNS A-Records through Private Endpoints is the recommended solution.

elements.name: automatedPrivateDnsZoneGroups
elements.label: DNS A-Records are deployed through Azure Policy
elements.toolTip: If 'Yes' is selected, Private DNS Zone Groups will not be deployed and we are assuming that this gets created through Azure Policies. If this does not get created, you will not be able to access any resources within this environment.

elements.name: privateDnsZonesSub
elements.label: Subscription with Private DNS Zones
elements.toolTip: Select the Subscription of your Private DNS Zones. If you have deployed the Data Management Landing Zone with a Firewall and Private DNS Zones then select the subscription that you have used for your Data Management Landing Zone.

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdKeyVault
elements.label: Private DNS Zone Key Vault (privatelink.vaultcore.azure.net)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for Key Vault (privatelink.vaultcore.azure.net).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.vaultcore.azure.net')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdSynapseDev
elements.label: Private DNS Zone Synapse Dev (privatelink.dev.azuresynapse.net)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for Synapse Dev (privatelink.dev.azuresynapse.net).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.dev.azuresynapse.net')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdSynapseSql
elements.label: Private DNS Zone Synapse Sql (privatelink.sql.azuresynapse.net)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for Synapse Sql (privatelink.sql.azuresynapse.net).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.sql.azuresynapse.net')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdDataFactory
elements.label: Private DNS Zone DataFactory (privatelink.datafactory.azure.net)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for DataFactory (privatelink.datafactory.azure.net).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.datafactory.azure.net')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdDataFactoryPortal
elements.label: Private DNS Zone DataFactory Portal (privatelink.adf.azure.com)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for DataFactory Portal (privatelink.adf.azure.com).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.adf.azure.com')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

elements.name: privateDnsZoneIdCosmosdbSql
elements.label: Private DNS Zone Cosmos SQL (privatelink.documents.azure.com)
elements.toolTip: Private DNS Zone for Cosmos SQL (privatelink.documents.azure.com).

constraints.allowedValues: [map(filter(steps('connectivitySettings').privateDnsZones.privateDnsZonesApi.value,(item) => contains(item.name, 'privatelink.documents.azure.com')),(item) => parse(concat('{"label":"', item.name, '","value":"', item.id, '","description":"', 'Resource Group: ', last(take(split(item.id, '/'), 5)), '"}')))]

subLabel.preValidation: Provide tags that will be used for all resources.
